In what language would you prefer to complete the survey? Please select one. / بأي لغة تفضل إكمال الاستبيان؟ رجاءا اختر واحدة

Your opinion is very valuable to us. Today we are asking you to participate in a survey about sportswear. The survey will take approximately 10-15 minutes of your time. This is for RESEARCH PURPOSES ONLY. We are not selling anything. Your answers will be grouped with others' answers anonymously and aggregated data sets will be analyzed purely for market research purposes only. Please note that the survey can be accessed only once. You will not be able to pause it and complete it later – please ensure to fill the entire survey. Check our Privacy Policy
In what country do you live?
What best describes your gender?
Have you heard of the following brands of sportswear?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
Have you seen the following brand(s) of sportswear advertised <u>online</u> in the past 30 days?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
How would you describe your overall opinion about the following brand(s) of sportswear?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
Next time you are looking to purchase sportswear, how likely are you to consider the following brand(s)?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
How likely are you to consider choosing each of these brands next time you buy running shoes?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
Which of the following brands of sportswear, if any, uses these messages in its advertising? "Impossible is nothing"
Please indicate how strongly you agree or disagree with the following statements about adidas. adidas…

Responses.Response: Is a brand that I would be happy to be seen wearing
Helps all types of people enjoy and do sport
Is a brand that makes good quality sportswear for performance
Is a clear and understandable brand in its messaging
Is the brand that help people to make the impossible possible

Question.Label: How do you feel about adidas?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
In addition to online advertising, where did you see, hear or read something about adidas recently?<ix:options><min 1></ix:options><ix:options><rotate></ix:options>

Responses.Response: In an article on a newspaper/magazine
On a poster on public transport
I didn’t see, hear or read anything about adidas

Question.Label: Please view the online advertisement below and answer the questions that follow.
[Creative Placeholder]
Were you able to...<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
Overall, how much do you like this ad?
Thinking about the ad you’ve just seen for adidas, which one of the phrases below applies to this ad?

Responses.Response: I would definitely remember the ad was for adidas
I would not be sure which sportswear the ad was for
I would not even be sure it was a sportswear ad

Question.Label:
Below are three lists of words that might apply to the online advertising you have been shown. For each of the three lists, please pick one word that you think applies to the ad.
You may feel that all the words apply or that none really apply, but we would still like to know which one you think applies more than the others in each list
Click on the one word which applies most to the ad
Which one of these applies most to the ad?
And which of these?
Again, thinking about the ad you’ve just seen for adidas, please indicate whether you agree or disagree with each of the following statements:<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>

Responses.Response: The points made in the ad were relevant to me
It contained new information about adidas
It made me think adidas is really different from other sportswear
It made me feel more positive about adidas

Question.Label: On average, how often do you use sportswear?

Responses.Response: N/A - I do not use this product

Question.Label: When did you last BUY clothing or footwear from a sports/lifestyle brand?

Responses.Response: I do not buy clothing or footwear from sports/lifestyle brands

Question.Label: How much do you enjoy playing/watching/listening to sport?
Please indicate how interested or uninterested you are in each of the activities/causes below.<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>

Responses.Response: Style (fashion, street culture, street art, clubbing)
Exercise at the gym, Apparel for exercises
Latest technology and gadgets (e.g. new devices, wearables, trackers etc.)
Music, Art and Culture (e.g. rap music, festivals, concerts, theatre, exhibitions, etc.)
Social causes (e.g. Active interest or engagement/ volunteering, protests, Black Lives Matter, Me Too, Fridays for Future etc.)

Question.Label: In a typical <u>week</u>, how many hours do you spend online visiting websites while at work, home, and other locations (not including time spent on other Internet applications such as e-mail)?
How often do you visit these sites or apps?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>

GridHeaders.Header: Never visit using smartphone or tablet

Question.Label: On average, how long do you spend on these sites or apps during each visit?<ix:options><rotate></ix:options>
Thank you for participating in this survey. Your opinions are appreciated. Please click "Submit" to complete the survey and return to your originating Web page.
